name: Khan VS Kahn
description:
Khan VS Kahn is a turn-based strategy game.
Chalenge a friend in a 1v1 Duel where only the smartest win everytime.

Modes :
- Hotseat against a friend
- Against the AI (4 races to fight with increasing difficulty)

A mix between European board games and sid meier's civilization
Two race compete to be the best and achieve one of 5 victory types
You can use our enemies building but be carefull he can use yours!

What kind of victory will you achieve ?
